I can't do lolis!\""},{"lineNumber":4694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ポピンズのエロ本とか、発狂するわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Poppins' adult magazines? They drive me crazy!\""},{"lineNumber":4695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……一緒になって読んだの？　カオス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You read them together? Chaos...\""},{"lineNumber":4696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おわーーーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oghhh—!\""},{"lineNumber":4697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………その、満鉄王。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Um, Man Tetsuo.\""},{"lineNumber":4698,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大変申し上げにくいのですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's very difficult to say this, but...\""},{"lineNumber":4699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、総統に返せって？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, you want me to return it to the Chancellor?\""},{"lineNumber":4700,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うんまあ、やってみたかっただけだし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I just wanted to try it out,\""},{"lineNumber":4701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　構わんよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"so I don't mind.\""},{"lineNumber":4702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そう、ですか…………ほ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-is that so... huh.\""},{"lineNumber":4703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……儂も、真剣に世界を憂いておる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However... I too am seriously concerned about the world.\""},{"lineNumber":4704,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統殿一人の負担をなんとか軽くできないかと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thinking how to somehow lighten the Chancellor's burden alone...\""},{"lineNumber":4705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その一心で、儂は…………","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With that intent, I...\""},{"lineNumber":4706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":4707,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけじゃからして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So that being the case,\""},{"lineNumber":4708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パンツ見せて？　ね、見せて。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"show me your panties? Alright.\""},{"lineNumber":4717,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すまぬ、そこの方よ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me, sir over there...\""},{"lineNumber":4718,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes?\""},{"lineNumber":4719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さーて、次はどうやって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then, how should I...\""},{"lineNumber":4720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ。ポピンズのお姫はんやおまへんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, isn't that Poppins’ princess?\""},{"lineNumber":4721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええと……行商人の方でちね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... I’m a traveling merchant.\""},{"lineNumber":4722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「商売人のプルーペットでおま。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am the merchant Pulupet.\""},{"lineNumber":4723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か用立てるものなど、おまへんか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is there anything you might need?\""},{"lineNumber":4724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー。必要な物は作るのがポピンズなのでちが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. Poppins makes what we need, so...\""},{"lineNumber":4725,"originalJapaneseLine":"そら、からくり売ろうとは思ってまへんがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course, I’m not thinking of selling your mechanisms.\""},{"lineNumber":4726,"originalJapaneseLine":"　むしろ買い取らせて頂きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'd rather buy them from you.\""},{"lineNumber":4727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せやけど、そうでんな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, well,\""},{"lineNumber":4728,"originalJapaneseLine":"　香水とかどうでっか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How about some perfume?\""},{"lineNumber":4729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………香水」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Perfume.\""},{"lineNumber":4730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ。男がメロメロになるようなアレですわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. That thing which makes men completely infatuated.\""},{"lineNumber":4731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ついでに、媚薬も混ぜて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And I mixed in some aphrodisiac as well...\""},{"lineNumber":4732,"originalJapaneseLine":"　興味おまへんか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you interested?\""},{"lineNumber":4733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっ、そんなもの……邪道でち。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-That kind of thing... is unnatural.\""},{"lineNumber":4734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ポピンズは、そんな動物的な恋は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Poppins doesn't do that animalistic kind of love...\""},{"lineNumber":4735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや。不要でっか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? You don’t need it?\""},{"lineNumber":4736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いやー、効果ごっついんでっけどなー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, the effect is pretty strong though.\""},{"lineNumber":4737,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうでっか、もったいない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so? What a waste...\""},{"lineNumber":4738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........................\""},{"lineNumber":4739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、好まないのでちけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I don't like it, but...\""},{"lineNumber":4740,"originalJapaneseLine":"　商人さんの顔を立てることも必要ということも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I understand that sometimes you have to respect the merchant's face.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃ儂のマシン、剣振るように作ってないからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, my machine wasn't built for swinging a sword."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 胴体部分に装置組み込んで、しゅぱーんと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I installed a device in the torso, so it goes 'shupaan' (shoots out)."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 獅子パル丼システムと名付けたよ」
「自動回収装置も組み込んだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I also incorporated an automatic retrieval device,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 撃っては戻し撃っては戻し」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "fire it out, then pull it back, fire it out, then pull it back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂、儂、斬りたいのに……
エクスペンダブルズは嫌ーー！」
「そういうわけで、使ってたらエロがね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So yeah, when I was using it, my 'ero' energy, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足りなくなっちゃってね？」
「戦闘中に補給しようかと思ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought about resupplying during the fight,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げられちゃうしさー」
「そりゃ逃げますよー！」
「あと！　儂、ロリ無理！
ポピンズのエロ本とか、発狂するわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Poppins' adult magazines? They drive me crazy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……一緒になって読んだの？　カオス……」
「お、おわーーーーーーっ！」
「…………その、満鉄王。
大変申し上げにくいのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's very difficult to say this, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、総統に返せって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you want me to return it to the Chancellor?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うんまあ、やってみたかっただけだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I just wanted to try it out,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 構わんよ」
「そ、そう、ですか…………ほ」
「しかし……儂も、真剣に世界を憂いておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... I too am seriously concerned about the world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統殿一人の負担をなんとか軽くできないかと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thinking how to somehow lighten the Chancellor's burden alone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その一心で、儂は…………
「というわけじゃからして、
パンツ見せて？　ね、見せて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "show me your panties? Please, show me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣にパワー注入しよ？　しよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let me pump some power into the magic sword, alright?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポピンズの恥をさらすのはそこまででち！！」
「ふぅおおおおぉっ！」
カオスはどうにか、ランスの元に帰ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos somehow managed to return to Lance's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――時間を過去に、戻すことはできぬ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—You cannot turn back time to the past."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、時計の針を進めることはできる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, you can move the hands of the clock forward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふむ。よし。
すまぬ、そこの方よ…………」
「はいな？」
「さーて、次はどうやって……」
「おっ。ポピンズのお姫はんやおまへんか」
「ええと……行商人の方でちね」
「商売人のプルーペットでおま。
何か用立てるものなど、おまへんか？」
「んー。必要な物は作るのがポピンズなのでちが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. Poppins makes what we need, so..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そら、からくり売ろうとは思ってまへんがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, I’m not thinking of selling your mechanisms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ買い取らせて頂きます」
「せやけど、そうでんな。
香水とかどうでっか？」
「ええ。男がメロメロになるようなアレですわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. That thing which makes men completely infatuated."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついでに、媚薬も混ぜて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And I mixed in some aphrodisiac as well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味おまへんか？」
「そっ、そんなもの……邪道でち。
ポピンズは、そんな動物的な恋は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Poppins doesn't do that animalistic kind of love..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや。不要でっか？
いやー、効果ごっついんでっけどなー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, the effect is pretty strong though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうでっか、もったいない……」
「こ、好まないのでちけど、
商人さんの顔を立てることも必要ということも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand that sometimes you have to respect the merchant's face."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—You cannot turn back time to the past."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、時計の針を進めることはできる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, you can move the hands of the clock forward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふむ。よし。
すまぬ、そこの方よ…………」
「はいな？」
「さーて、次はどうやって……」
「おっ。ポピンズのお姫はんやおまへんか」
「ええと……行商人の方でちね」
「商売人のプルーペットでおま。
何か用立てるものなど、おまへんか？」
「んー。必要な物は作るのがポピンズなのでちが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. Poppins makes what we need, so..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そら、からくり売ろうとは思ってまへんがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, I’m not thinking of selling your mechanisms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ買い取らせて頂きます」
「せやけど、そうでんな。
香水とかどうでっか？」
「ええ。男がメロメロになるようなアレですわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. That thing which makes men completely infatuated."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついでに、媚薬も混ぜて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And I mixed in some aphrodisiac as well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味おまへんか？」
「そっ、そんなもの……邪道でち。
ポピンズは、そんな動物的な恋は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Poppins doesn't do that animalistic kind of love..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや。不要でっか？
いやー、効果ごっついんでっけどなー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, the effect is pretty strong though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうでっか、もったいない……」
「こ、好まないのでちけど、
商人さんの顔を立てることも必要ということも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand that sometimes you have to respect the merchant's face."
